title: Having issues Patching 7.4? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

New patch, new memes, and new possibilities for all!  Well...except Yasuo, he was probably banned anyway.  

For everyone else looking to get a fresh start, don't let patching issues get in your way!  If you encounter a problem, the steps below should get you moving forward to the next looming Penta!

--------------------------------------------------------------

#***Updated Client (Beta Client)***

>*** Error: "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client or try again."***

This issue rears its ugly head if something went wrong in either the updating or the installation process of the Client Update. The solution is to complete a full and clean reinstallation of League by following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to a T.

>***My IP Balance in the Store is incorrect***

There have been some issues with the client pulling correct IP balances. Some players have been able to resolve this by launching into the Legacy Client and making a single purchase to resolve this. If this does not work, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work together to resolve this.

>***I toggled the language filter off but still see words too rich for my tastes***

We've seen a few reports of the mature language filter not toggling correctly.  It's now possible to disable and enable the filter in-game by typing:  **/chatfilter** into the in-game chat.  For the more visually inclined, [check out this screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/K92fiCb.png).


--------------------------------------------------------------

#***Legacy Client***

>***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

replies.body: Went in for match and this is what happened in champ selection what the heck. http://imgur.com/a/V04TQ litterly couldn't pick my champion.

SAME!!!! and i messaged riot support they made me lose my promos :/
sad
man that sucks. everyone is blaming me for not looking the chat, but when i joined they already picked, how can i see anything.
To clarify, were you experiencing a black screen or just unable to see chat?
The issue is that when we click "Accept" the screen goes black and we get stuck for 30 seconds before getting to champ select causing missed bans which has lead to me having leaver buster.
i can hear the sound and sure i am in the game, but i cant see anything for about 10 s, a lot of text is missed during that time

We've been investigating a black screen issue in champion select, and found that collapsing your friends list groups can serve as a work around.  

https://i.imgur.com/wMLOFya.png

Let me know if that works for you!

this has happen 4 times to me. Twice when I was in promos. This is complete bullshit riot. Pls fix client I have gotten 3, 26 min leavbusters and have lost hours of my time. Atleast gift me or give me back my lp seriously riot. My account is WASHLNG MACHLNE so you know who to gift.
Same thing happens to me every time I go into champ select of any gamemode.......

Are you still  having this issue?  We've updated the issue with a simpler resolution through collapsing your friend's list groups before queuing.  

https://i.imgur.com/wMLOFya.png

I hope that helps!
im having the same issue and my friends list wasnt up b4 i qued and im still having this issue. I LOST MY PROMOS becuase of this can you at least give me back my lp? or something??

I have been having exactly the same issue going into champ select. Only since the latest patch. i don't think us players have changed anything that would make it suddenly do this. It is quite hampering on my playing. I'm afraid to play because I don't wanna get some ridiculous auto penalty for something that is out of my control.

We're digging deeper into this to find out why some players are getting the black screens at champion select, which is something that is usually caused by connection issues.  In this specific case, we've found that a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) has served as a fix for now.  Let me know if that works out for you.
this is the reason im here

This new patch is literally unplayable. Every time I enter champion select my screen goes black for 10-20 seconds and I can't pick my champion. When I get into the game I get disconnected every 5 minutes, even though my internet is perfectly fine and I have absolutely no connection issues. Really sucks when I desperately want to play some URF! D:

Litterly have this since new patch to, never had trouble with league,   is there comming a hotfix?  if i have to reinstall my game, i would like a rp gift, for the trouble i have doing that and missing all those games
why am i not able to play URF..
I have the same problem.
The rotating game mode still has to be activated, which is usually in the afternoon on Fridays.  Hang tight!
It's Saturday morning here in oceania and I still can't play arurf. Client had a small patch but no arurf in game modes and ranked flexed has also disappeared
ARURF should be live now.  Can you relog and try again?  If you still can't see it, can you provide a screenshot?  Let me know.

Shutdown computer and logged back in and same issue. Restarted client and loaded leagcy client and this time had ranked flex but no ARURF. logged out of client and loaded new client and this time has ranked flex (didn't before) but still no ARURF.http://imgur.com/ClqkTj4
It's just appeared randomly after an aram game
THAT BLACK SCREEN HAPPENED TO ME TOO I HAVE WAITED FOR OVER AN HOUR TO PLAY A FUCKIGN GAME COME THE FUCK ON RIOT!!!

After the update my fps dropped from an average of 60 all the way down to 07.  It screwed up my ranked game. I tried closing all apps i had open at the time, and played on lowest quality, but my fps would never make it past 12. What am i supposed to do to fix this.
I am having an issue with "PVP.net Patcher kernel not working."
Right click, start as administrater
Didn't work for me

The kernel error is generally a security setting that's preventing the patcher or client from loading.  In addition to Targon's steps, I also suggest going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.  I hope that helps!
Can't make a room. The Play button is grey
Your client may have still been in the process of patching.  Is this still a problem?
I can not play practice tool. when i enter its just black screen.
Are you able to make a custom game?  Where are you getting the black screen exactly?
When I start a match instead of actually loading an actual window it loads a black screen.  This caused me to get a rank lost =(

I'm having a huge problem, it's the second time my client crashes during loading screen, i got reported by 9 people the first time and i got put in a low priority queue, what is next? If i get reported again i might get banned for no reason, black screen saying i have no internet connection, i click cancel to reconnect again but the system says the client crashed, i mean if you guys know my client crashed then why would i get punished by the leaver system? 


http://imgur.com/a/g9JkN

Cant play Lol!!!!
Disconnect at load screen all time
Even whith betta and fix
{{item:3151}}
Are you getting any error messages, or is it just a black screen?

After I updated to 7.4 i got a irritating problem with coming in to champ select in normal games.. I get in ca 10 seconds later than usuall so all lanes got "picked" before I even got in, I'm positive that this isn't caused by my internet.. anyone else that got this problem?

Is the screen black?  This is an issue we've been looking into, but in the meantime a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) should fix it up.  Let me know if it persists afterwards.

Since this patch, each time I join into champion select the loading time is very slow. I am on the new client and as soon as i start joining a champion select, the screen will black out for 20-30 seconds before resuming back to normal. This is very frustrating as in ranked games, I've lost LP and almost my platinum promos due to not being able to ban in time.
Riot help me please when i want to launch my game...to patch my client there is only black screen and i cant click on anthing please fix it or just help me!
can u guys play URF btw i'm on EUNE

**i got problem after patched the client **

when i press Accept on Matchmaking i got Black Screen for about 20 sec that prevent me to choose runes and skills from the game

Hm, so I queued up for a game and then got the pop up, after i accepted I went straight to champion select but however my client was just all black and i could do anything, so after from what i'm guessing not being able to lock in as the screen was black, it went back to the lobby which then i had to wait 5 minutes and the it happened again and this time i decided to repair the client in order to try solve the problem, and the most unfortunate thing is that i lost overall 13 LP and a penalty of 30 minutes because of this bug or whatever is is...

Getting a black screen (just over the client, except the chat/friends section) and a 20 second delay on my champion select in blind pick. It's essentially guaranteeing that I can't choose my preferred position.
Does it look like this is a thread for balance?
My game still won't load i've tried for almost 2 weeks and it won't work riot pls help.

When I get out of a match, the blue L symbol pops up and it keeps spinning and it takes forever to stop spinning. Eventually, the end of game screen will pop up, but after a while. Also, I'm getting this message which has never occurred to me before. FPS drops are also common for me now. It usually occurs around the afternoon and night, and tabs closed or open doesn't really affect it.

I use a MacBook Air btw. 

https://i.gyazo.com/512838fcab4a3b22cd7da7255a391458.png]
